issue.title: [R][CI] Remove ubuntu-18.04 from nixlibs & prebuilt binaries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17876](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17876). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The new dts compiled centos-7 binaries ([ARROW-17594]) should be able to replace the ubuntu-18.04 binaries.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17876?focusedCommentId=17611538) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Duplicate of ARROW-16976?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17876?focusedCommentId=17611745) by Jacob Wujciak-Jens (assignUser):*
I read the other one as just adding and created this one for testing, removal and logic changes in nixlibs.R
